info.description: This is Project-Hus's root authentication server containing each user's UUID, which is unique for all hus services.
info.title: Project-Hus auth server

post.description:
at the same time user connects to lifthus newly, the client requests new session token.
and the server returns session id with session token in cookie.
post.summary: gets new connection and assign a lifthus session token.

201.description: returns session id with session token in cookie
